Attributes.description: Epidemiology of viral, bacterial and parasitic infections with emphasis on the control of these infections in human populations. Immunization programs will be stressed.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) all of HCEP 400, HCEP 502 or (b) all of SPPH 400, SPPH 502.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon, Start Time: 9:00, End Time: 12:00
